org.cripac.isee.vpe.data

Class HDFSReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cripac.isee.vpe.data.HDFSReader

  • public class HDFSReader
extends java.lang.Object
    The HDFSReader class is the base class for classes that read and parse data from HDFS.
    Author:
    Ken Yu, CRIPAC, 2016

    • Method Detail

      • listSubfiles

        public java.util.List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path> listSubfiles(@Nonnull
                                                              org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        If the path specifies a directory, list all the sub-files in it. If the path specifies a file, return the path itself.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of a directory or a file.
        Returns:
        Paths of sub-files if the path specifies a directory or the given path itself if the path specifies a file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On error reading files in Hadoop Filesystem.
